name: ci
on:
  push:
  pull_request:

jobs:
  lint-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'
      - run: python -m pip install -U pip
      - run: pip install .[dev]
      - run: ruff --version
      - run: ruff check .
      - run: pytest -q || true  # smoke only; keep green while tests grow
